instruction: Search for task 'build-images' in the attestation
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_found if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "build-images"
}

instruction: What are the results from task 'build-image-index'?
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_results := [result |
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "build-image-index"
    some result in task.results
]

instruction: Retrieve the bundle reference for task 'fbc-target-index-pruning-check'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "fbc-target-index-pruning-check"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "fbc-target-index-pruning-check"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}

package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_timestamp := timestamp if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "build-source-image"
    timestamp := task.startedOn
}

instruction: Find material with URI 'quay.io/konflux-ci/tekton-catalog/task-init' and commit 'ded314206f09712b2116deb050b774ae7efef9ab243794334c8e616871a3ffa5'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

material_found if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some material in att.statement.predicate.materials
    material.uri == "quay.io/konflux-ci/tekton-catalog/task-init"
    material.digest.sha1 == "ded314206f09712b2116deb050b774ae7efef9ab243794334c8e616871a3ffa5"
}

instruction: Check if material exists with URI 'quay.io/konflux-ci/tekton-catalog/task-init'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

material_found if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some material in att.statement.predicate.materials
    material.uri == "quay.io/konflux-ci/tekton-catalog/task-init"
}

instruction: Find the bundle used by task 'init'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "init"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "init"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}
